```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)
```

Import the weather data.

```{r}
weather_df = 
  rnoaa::meteo_pull_monitors(
    c("USW00094728", "USW00022534", "USS0023B17S"),
    var = c("PRCP", "TMIN", "TMAX"), 
    date_min = "2021-01-01",
    date_max = "2022-12-31") |>
  mutate(
    name = case_match(
      id, 
      "USW00094728" ~ "CentralPark_NY", 
      "USW00022534" ~ "Molokai_HI",
      "USS0023B17S" ~ "Waterhole_WA"),
    tmin = tmin / 10,
    tmax = tmax / 10) |>
  select(name, id, everything())
```

Making first plot.

```{r message=FALSE}
ggplot(weather_df, aes(x = tmin, y = tmax)) + 
  geom_point()
```

```{r message=FALSE}
weather_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = tmin, y = tmax)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r message=FALSE}
ggp_weather_scatterplot = 
  weather_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = tmin, y = tmax)) +
  geom_point()

ggp_weather_scatterplot
```

More scatterplots.

```{r message=FALSE}
weather_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = tmin, y = tmax, colour = name)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r message=FALSE}
weather_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = tmin, y = tmax, colour = name)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.3, size = 0.8) + 
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE)
```

Where you define aesthetics can matter.

```{r message=FALSE}
weather_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = tmin, y = tmax)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = name), alpha = 0.3, size = 0.8) + 
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE)

# Here geom_smooth() cannot get color = name
```

Use facetinng real quick

```{r message=FALSE}
weather_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = tmin, y = tmax, colour = name)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.3, size = 0.8) + 
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE) +
  facet_grid(. ~ name)
# facet_grid to separate, easier to read

weather_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = tmin, y = tmax, colour = name)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.3, size = 0.8) + 
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE) +
  facet_grid(name ~ .)
# more difficult to read
```

Make a more interesting scatterplot

```{r message=FALSE}
weather_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = tmax, colour = name)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r message=FALSE}
weather_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = tmax, colour = name, size = prcp)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.3) +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE) +
  facet_grid(. ~ name)
```

Learning assessment

```{r}
weather_df |>
  filter(name == "CentralPark_NY") |>
  mutate(
    tmax_fahr = tmax * (9/5) + 32,
    tmin_fahr = tmin * (9/5) + 32
  ) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = tmin_fahr, y = tmax_fahr)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE)
```
